title: Bump API version again and aim for Chromebook compat.
message: Bump API version again and aim for Chromebook compat.

title: Enable Chromebook usage, and bump target SDK to 24.
message: Enable Chromebook usage, and bump target SDK to 24.

title: Make 'protoc' run from anywhere in PATH.
message: Make 'protoc' run from anywhere in PATH.

title: Handle database version upgrades on in-place open.
message:
Handle database version upgrades on in-place open.

This allows us to upgrade databases during app upgrades and not just on
import.

Also improves some error log entries and the error message shown on
database upgrade failures.

title: Upgrade database from string fields to blob.
message: Upgrade database from string fields to blob.

title: Fix case insensitive sorting of results.
message:
Fix case insensitive sorting of results.

I'm not sure why COLLATE NOCASE didn't work, but ordering by LOWER(...)
does.

title: Fix bugs in char[] conversion.
message:
Fix bugs in char[] conversion.

1. Don't append null chars from char[] buf to TextViews.
2. Do zeroing out of in-memory copies on onDestroyView, not onStop.

title: Switch to char[] for data storage in-memory.
message:
Switch to char[] for data storage in-memory.

This change uses getBlob/setBlob to store byte[]-encoded char[]s in the
database, rather than getString/setString. It also tries its best to
destroy in-memory copies of things when fragments are stopped, etc.

HOWEVER, IT BREAKS SUBSTRING SEARCH FOR UNICODE SUBSTRINGS. That worked
before--I'm not sure why this breaks it, but it may be an encoding
incompatibility.

title: Fix bugs introduced into add/edit flow.
message: Fix bugs introduced into add/edit flow.

title: Move import into ItemListActivity. Improve handling of import UI.
message:
Move import into ItemListActivity. Improve handling of import UI.
Increment version.

title: Reorder password generation chars to start with an easy one.
message: Reorder password generation chars to start with an easy one.

title: Fix bugs in add record, title of activity, title of fragment.
message: Fix bugs in add record, title of activity, title of fragment.

title: Pull out synchronous createRecord into private method.
message: Pull out synchronous createRecord into private method.

title: Improve menu for dual-pane. No-cancel on Progress spinner.
message: Improve menu for dual-pane. No-cancel on Progress spinner.

title: Migrate most database operations to async.
message: Migrate most database operations to async.

title: Move edit and detail record loading into AsyncTasks.
message: Move edit and detail record loading into AsyncTasks.

title: Don't animate transition to unlock activity on resume.
message: Don't animate transition to unlock activity on resume.

title: Remove showcaseview submodule, as we now get the thing from maven.
message: Remove showcaseview submodule, as we now get the thing from maven.

title: Fix selection on cancel-edit. Add selection on add.
message: Fix selection on cancel-edit. Add selection on add.

title: Fix crash in Edit context menu.
message: Fix crash in Edit context menu.

title: Switch to LoaderManager to manage database lifecycle.
message: Switch to LoaderManager to manage database lifecycle.

title: Fix ShowcaseView interaction with menu bar.
message: Fix ShowcaseView interaction with menu bar.

title: Add locking if someone goes "back" to unlock menu. Fix text.
message: Add locking if someone goes "back" to unlock menu. Fix text.

title: Set detail/edit title to domain of item.
message: Set detail/edit title to domain of item.

title: Update SQLCipher binaries to built from latest source.
message: Update SQLCipher binaries to built from latest source.

title: Fix syntax error in SQL query (again!).
message: Fix syntax error in SQL query (again!).

title: Really fix case-insensitive sorting this time.
message: Really fix case-insensitive sorting this time.

title: Add showcaseview help docs.
message:
Add showcaseview help docs.

Includes an overlay for how to add keys on first run and for how to
generate passwords in the edit view. The latter could use some work.

title: Set absolute protoc path.
message:
Set absolute protoc path.

 This is kinda silly, but I'm not sure how to set env vars for Android
Studio.

title: Add custom build to build proto.
message: Add custom build to build proto.

title: More properly handle rotation during background tasks.
message: More properly handle rotation during background tasks.

title: Don't crash on window rotation when tasks finish.
message:
Don't crash on window rotation when tasks finish.

This doesn't address the underlying problem of handling rotation
improperly when there's an outstanding task; we now leak the progress
dialogs. But at least the crash is fixed.

title: Fixed "next" button for create/unlock/change password fields.
message: Fixed "next" button for create/unlock/change password fields.

title: Lock database before deletion. This avoids having the handle still open
message:
Lock database before deletion. This avoids having the handle still open
on a deleted database.

title: Cleaned up layout and changed font sizes.
message: Cleaned up layout and changed font sizes.

title: Improve import UI: async import, progress spinner.
message: Improve import UI: async import, progress spinner.

title: Update field visibility on database reload.
message: Update field visibility on database reload.

title: Format code and remove unneeded imports.
message: Format code and remove unneeded imports.

title: Add show/hide password on edit pane, too.
message: Add show/hide password on edit pane, too.

title: Bring back OpenDatabaseHelper. Fix bug in create.
message: Bring back OpenDatabaseHelper. Fix bug in create.

title: Don't display empty fields in detail view.
message: Don't display empty fields in detail view.

title: UI polish.
message:
UI polish.

Widen two-pane layout. Remove detail fragment hints.

title: Create parent directories before creating database.
message:
Create parent directories before creating database.

SQLDatabaseHelper apparently does this behind the covers; the previous
CL introduced this bug such that new devices could not be initialized.

That will teach me to only test on my already-installed phone before
comitting.

title: Updated README to point to folder for APKs. Duh!
message: Updated README to point to folder for APKs. Duh!

title: Fixed KDF iterations to be honored, and other bugs.
message:
Fixed KDF iterations to be honored, and other bugs.

1. PRAGMA kdf_iter wasn't happening at the right point, so we were using
the default 65k iterations. Fixed.
2. Upped iterations to 256k after some testing on a Nexus 5. This might
be ungainly...
3. Removed unnecessary SQLDatabaseHelper usage and simplified
SQLCipherDatabase design.
4. Minor bugfix in Common DisplayException().

title: Add zeroing out of password char[].
message: Add zeroing out of password char[].

title: Converted master key to char[] on creation/unlock.
message:
Converted master key to char[] on creation/unlock.

On rekey it's still passed as a String, and so are the stored fields.

Passing around passwords as a String is probably not so great, since
object GC is unspecified behavior (meaning plaintext passwords might sit
around for a while).

title: Fixed KDF iter setting. Fixed resume on locked DB.
message: Fixed KDF iter setting. Fixed resume on locked DB.

title: Remove KDF iter change/password change after open.
message:
Remove KDF iter change/password change after open.

This seems to result in the database becoming unopenable. I have some
concern over whether the default KDF iter setting is taking effect
currently without a rekey, however, but the prior default is 64k, which
is mostly OK.

Still, this bears further looking.

title: Made ALPHA warning a bit more explicit...
message: Made ALPHA warning a bit more explicit...

title: UI tweaks.
message:
UI tweaks.

Fix import dialog to use password styling on password field.

Remove "remarks" hint from details page.
